mapper.sql: SORT_ID, SORT_NO, SORT_NAME, SORT_PARENT, HAVE_CHILD, DEPT_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from form_sort
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into form_sort
SORT_ID,
SORT_NO,
SORT_NAME,
SORT_PARENT,
HAVE_CHILD,
DEPT_ID,

mapper.update:
update form_sort
SORT_ID = #{record.sortId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SORT_NO = #{record.sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SORT_NAME = #{record.sortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT_PARENT = #{record.sortParent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HAVE_CHILD = #{record.haveChild,jdbcType=CHAR},
DEPT_ID = #{record.deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update form_sort set SORT_ID = #{record.sortId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SORT_NO = #{record.sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SORT_NAME = #{record.sortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT_PARENT = #{record.sortParent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HAVE_CHILD = #{record.haveChild,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEPT_ID = #{record.deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update form_sort
SORT_NO = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SORT_NAME = #{sortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT_PARENT = #{sortParent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HAVE_CHILD = #{haveChild,jdbcType=CHAR},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where SORT_ID = #{sortId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update form_sort set SORT_NO = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SORT_NAME = #{sortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT_PARENT = #{sortParent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HAVE_CHILD = #{haveChild,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where SORT_ID = #{sortId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT form_sort.*,countform.FORM_COUNTS,department.DEPT_ID,department.DEPT_NAME FROM form_sort LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(flow_form_type.FORM_ID) AS FORM_COUNTS,flow_form_type.FORM_SORT FROM flow_form_type GROUP BY flow_form_type.FORM_SORT ) AS countform ON countform.FORM_SORT=form_sort.SORT_ID LEFT JOIN department ON department.DEPT_ID=form_sort.DEPT_ID
form_sort.DEPT_ID=#{deptId} OR form_sort.DEPT_ID=0
form_sort.DEPT_ID=0
ORDER BY SORT_NO,SORT_ID ASC

SELECT form_sort.*,countform.FORM_COUNTS,department.DEPT_ID,department.DEPT_NAME FROM form_sort LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(flow_form_type.FORM_ID) AS FORM_COUNTS,flow_form_type.FORM_SORT FROM flow_form_type GROUP BY flow_form_type.FORM_SORT ) countform ON countform.FORM_SORT=form_sort.SORT_ID LEFT JOIN department ON department.DEPT_ID=form_sort.DEPT_ID
form_sort.DEPT_ID=#{deptId} OR form_sort.DEPT_ID=0
form_sort.DEPT_ID=0
ORDER BY SORT_NO,SORT_ID ASC

SELECT form_sort.*,countform.FORM_COUNTS,department.DEPT_ID,department.DEPT_NAME FROM form_sort LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(flow_form_type.FORM_ID) AS FORM_COUNTS,flow_form_type.FORM_SORT FROM flow_form_type GROUP BY flow_form_type.FORM_SORT ) countform ON countform.FORM_SORT=form_sort.SORT_ID LEFT JOIN department ON department.DEPT_ID=form_sort.DEPT_ID
form_sort.DEPT_ID=#{deptId} OR form_sort.DEPT_ID=0
form_sort.DEPT_ID=0
ORDER BY SORT_NO,SORT_ID ASC

SELECT form_sort.*,countform.FORM_COUNTS,department.DEPT_ID,department.DEPT_NAME FROM form_sort LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(flow_form_type.FORM_ID) AS FORM_COUNTS,flow_form_type.FORM_SORT FROM flow_form_type GROUP BY flow_form_type.FORM_SORT ) AS countform ON countform.FORM_SORT=form_sort.SORT_ID LEFT JOIN department ON department.DEPT_ID=form_sort.DEPT_ID
form_sort.DEPT_ID=#{deptId} OR form_sort.DEPT_ID=0
form_sort.DEPT_ID=0
ORDER BY SORT_NO,SORT_ID ASC

SELECT form_sort.*,countform.FORM_COUNTS,department.DEPT_ID,department.DEPT_NAME FROM form_sort LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(flow_form_type.FORM_ID) AS FORM_COUNTS,flow_form_type.FORM_SORT FROM flow_form_type GROUP BY flow_form_type.FORM_SORT ) countform ON countform.FORM_SORT=form_sort.SORT_ID LEFT JOIN department ON department.DEPT_ID=form_sort.DEPT_ID
form_sort.DEPT_ID=#{deptId} OR form_sort.DEPT_ID=0
form_sort.DEPT_ID=0
ORDER BY SORT_NO,SORT_ID ASC

SELECT form_sort.*,countform.FORM_COUNTS,department.DEPT_ID,department.DEPT_NAME FROM form_sort LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(flow_form_type.FORM_ID) AS FORM_COUNTS,flow_form_type.FORM_SORT FROM flow_form_type GROUP BY flow_form_type.FORM_SORT ) countform ON countform.FORM_SORT=form_sort.SORT_ID LEFT JOIN department ON department.DEPT_ID=form_sort.DEPT_ID
form_sort.DEPT_ID=#{deptId} OR form_sort.DEPT_ID=0
form_sort.DEPT_ID=0
ORDER BY SORT_NO,SORT_ID ASC

SELECT COUNT(flow_form_type.FORM_ID) AS FORM_COUNTS FROM flow_form_type
( flow_form_type.DEPT_ID=#{deptId} OR flow_form_type.DEPT_ID=0 ) AND
flow_form_type.DEPT_ID=0 AND
( flow_form_type.FORM_SORT=0 or flow_form_type.FORM_SORT IS NULL )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM form_sort WHERE form_sort.SORT_PARENT=#{sordId}
SELECT COUNT(flow_form_type.FORM_ID) AS FORM_COUNTS FROM flow_form_type WHERE flow_form_type.FORM_SORT=#{formId}
